trans-unit.source: This dataset contains a series of records from steel annealing trials with the physical attributes (width, thickness, type (coil, sheet, etc.) of the resulting steel types.
trans-unit.target: This dataset contains a series of records from steel annealing trials with the physical attributes (width, thickness, type (coil, sheet, etc.) of the resulting steel types.

trans-unit.source: Usage: Predict any of two numeric class attributes; hardness or strength.
trans-unit.target: Usage: Predict any of two numeric class attributes; hardness or strength.

trans-unit.source: You might also analyze correlations among attributes.
trans-unit.target: You might also analyze correlations among attributes.

trans-unit.source: Steel grades follow a set standard, defined by SAE and other organizations.
trans-unit.target: Steel grades follow a set standard, defined by SAE and other organizations.

trans-unit.source: You are looking for a specific 'grade' (the class variable) and want to understand the values needed.
trans-unit.target: You are looking for a specific 'grade' (the class variable) and want to understand the values needed.

trans-unit.source: Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science
trans-unit.target: Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science

trans-unit.source: A useful guide to steel grades can be found here: http://www.outokumpu.com/SiteCollectionDocuments/Outokumpu-steel-grades-properties-global-standards.pdf
trans-unit.target: A useful guide to steel grades can be found here: http://www.outokumpu.com/SiteCollectionDocuments/Outokumpu-steel-grades-properties-global-standards.pdf
